info.name: NODEJS POS (Product Of Sales)

request.description: login for role admin or cashier

buat akun user atau kashir. (akses admin).

secara default role nya adalah user biasa

response.name: create user, must by admin. default is user role
create cashier user, must by admin

request.description: Can create single category or multiple category. Access by ADMIN

Delete single or multiple category. Access ADMIN. Will delete all product if category id is match
get all data product, (akses admin dan kasir)
